title: Sir John Major – 2021 Statement Following Death of HRH The Duke of Edinburgh
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Sir John Major on 9 April 2021.
content:
It is impossible to exaggerate the role that HRH The Duke of Edinburgh has played in his lifetime of service to the Monarchy and to the United Kingdom.
